abstract: The deal with the media agencies owned by the WPP Group is valued at $800 million to $900 million in commercial time.
snippet: The deal with the media agencies owned by the WPP Group is valued at $800 million to $900 million in commercial time.
lead_paragraph: The upfront market for the 2007-8 television season is getting under way with a large deal between the NBC Universal division of the General Electric Company and the media agencies owned by the WPP Group.

headline.main: Upfront TV Market Starts With NBC Universal Deal
headline.print_headline: Upfront TV Market Starts With NBC Universal Deal
